vernac_cmds: Definition prec_list_ref_ok (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) : Prop := forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s.
Definition state_ref_ok (s : state) (d : preDTA) : Prop := forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d.

Definition preDTA_ref_ok (d : preDTA) : Prop := forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0.
Definition preDTA_ref_ok_distinct (d d' : preDTA) : Prop := forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d'.
Definition DTA_ref_ok (d : DTA) : Prop := match d with | dta p a => preDTA_ref_ok p end.
Lemma prec_list_ref_ok_destr : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok (prec_cons a la ls) d -> prec_list_ref_ok la d /\ prec_list_ref_ok ls d.
exact (H a0 (prec_int0 a a0 la ls H0)).
exact (H a0 (prec_int1 a a0 la ls H0)).
Lemma state_ref_ok_M2_destr : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok (M2 prec_list s0 s1) d -> state_ref_ok s0 d /\ state_ref_ok s1 d.
induction a as [| p0]; exact H0.
induction a as [| p0]; exact H0.
Lemma preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d <-> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d).
exact (H a s a0 p a1 H0 H1 H2).
exact (H a s H0 c pl H1 b H2).
Lemma preDTA_ref_ok_distinct_dest : forall d0 d1 d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct (M2 state d0 d1) d -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d0 d /\ preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d1 d.
induction a as [| p]; exact H0.
induction a as [| p]; exact H0.
Definition addr_in_dta_check (d : preDTA) (a : ad) : bool := match MapGet state d a with | None => false | Some _ => true end.

Fixpoint prec_list_ref_ok_check (p : prec_list) : preDTA -> bool := fun d : preDTA => match p with | prec_empty => true | prec_cons a la ls => addr_in_dta_check d a && (prec_list_ref_ok_check la d && prec_list_ref_ok_check ls d) end.
Lemma prec_list_ref_ok_check_correct : forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok p d -> prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true.
elim (prec_list_ref_ok_destr a p0 p1 d H1).
Lemma prec_list_ref_ok_check_complete : forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true -> prec_list_ref_ok p d.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (addr_in_dta_check d a)); intros; rewrite H2 in H1.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (prec_list_ref_ok_check p1 d)); intros; rewrite H4 in H1.

Fixpoint state_ref_ok_check (s : state) : preDTA -> bool := fun d : preDTA => match s with | M0 => true | M1 a p => prec_list_ref_ok_check p d | M2 x y => state_ref_ok_check x d && state_ref_ok_check y d end.
Lemma state_ref_ok_check_correct : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok s d -> state_ref_ok_check s d = true.
induction a as [| p0]; simpl in |- *; exact H2.
induction a as [| p0]; simpl in |- *; exact H2.
Lemma state_ref_ok_check_complete : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok_check s d = true -> state_ref_ok s d.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (Neqb a a1)); intros; rewrite H1 in H0.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (state_ref_ok_check m d)); intros; rewrite H3 in H1.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (state_ref_ok_check m0 d)); intros; rewrite H4 in H1.
exact (H d H3 N0 p H2).
induction p0 as [p0 Hrecp0| p0 Hrecp0| ]; simpl in H2.
exact (H0 d H4 (Npos p0) p H2).
exact (H d H3 (Npos p0) p H2).
exact (H0 d H4 N0 p H2).

Fixpoint predta_ref_ok_check_0 (d : preDTA) : preDTA -> bool := fun d' : preDTA => match d with | M0 => true | M1 a s => state_ref_ok_check s d' | M2 x y => predta_ref_ok_check_0 x d' && predta_ref_ok_check_0 y d' end.
Definition predta_ref_ok_check (d : preDTA) : bool := predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d.
Lemma predta_ref_ok_check_correct_0 : forall d d' : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d d' -> predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d' = true.
induction d as [| a a0| d1 Hrecd1 d0 Hrecd0].
induction a as [| p]; simpl in |- *; exact H0.
induction a as [| p]; simpl in |- *; exact H0.
Lemma predta_ref_ok_check_complete_0 : forall d d' : preDTA, predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d' = true -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d d'.
simple induction d; simpl in |- *; intros.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (Neqb a a1)); intros; rewrite H1 in H0; inversion H0.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (predta_ref_ok_check_0 m d')); intros; rewrite H3 in H1.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (predta_ref_ok_check_0 m0 d')); intros; rewrite H4 in H1.
exact (H d' H3 N0 s H2).
induction p as [p Hrecp| p Hrecp| ].
exact (H0 d' H4 (Npos p) s H2).
exact (H d' H3 (Npos p) s H2).
exact (H0 d' H4 N0 s H2).
Lemma predta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> predta_ref_ok_check d = true.
Lemma predta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : preDTA, predta_ref_ok_check d = true -> preDTA_ref_ok d.
Definition dta_ref_ok_check (d : DTA) : bool := match d with | dta p a => predta_ref_ok_check p end.
Lemma dta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true.
Lemma dta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : DTA, dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d.
Definition addr_in_preDTA (d : preDTA) (a : ad) : Prop := exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s.
Definition DTA_main_state_correct (d : DTA) : Prop := match d with | dta p a => addr_in_preDTA p a end.
Definition DTA_main_state_correct_check (d : DTA) : bool := match d with | dta p a => match MapGet state p a with | None => false | Some _ => true end end.
Lemma DTA_main_state_correct_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct d -> DTA_main_state_correct_check d = true.
Lemma DTA_main_state_correct_check_complete : forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct_check d = true -> DTA_main_state_correct d.
elim (option_sum state (MapGet state p a)); intro y.

command: exact (H a0 (prec_int0 a a0 la ls H0)).
exact (H a0 (prec_int1 a a0 la ls H0)).
induction a as [| p0]; exact H0.
induction a as [| p0]; exact H0.
exact (H a s a0 p a1 H0 H1 H2).
exact (H a s H0 c pl H1 b H2).
induction a as [| p]; exact H0.
induction a as [| p]; exact H0.
elim (prec_list_ref_ok_destr a p0 p1 d H1).
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (addr_in_dta_check d a)); intros; rewrite H2 in H1.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (prec_list_ref_ok_check p1 d)); intros; rewrite H4 in H1.
induction a as [| p0]; simpl in |- *; exact H2.
induction a as [| p0]; simpl in |- *; exact H2.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (Neqb a a1)); intros; rewrite H1 in H0.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (state_ref_ok_check m d)); intros; rewrite H3 in H1.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (state_ref_ok_check m0 d)); intros; rewrite H4 in H1.
exact (H d H3 N0 p H2).
induction p0 as [p0 Hrecp0| p0 Hrecp0| ]; simpl in H2.
exact (H0 d H4 (Npos p0) p H2).
exact (H d H3 (Npos p0) p H2).
exact (H0 d H4 N0 p H2).
induction d as [| a a0| d1 Hrecd1 d0 Hrecd0].
induction a as [| p]; simpl in |- *; exact H0.
induction a as [| p]; simpl in |- *; exact H0.
simple induction d; simpl in |- *; intros.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (Neqb a a1)); intros; rewrite H1 in H0; inversion H0.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (predta_ref_ok_check_0 m d')); intros; rewrite H3 in H1.
elim (bool_is_true_or_false (predta_ref_ok_check_0 m0 d')); intros; rewrite H4 in H1.
exact (H d' H3 N0 s H2).
induction p as [p Hrecp| p Hrecp| ].
exact (H0 d' H4 (Npos p) s H2).
exact (H d' H3 (Npos p) s H2).
exact (H0 d' H4 N0 s H2).
elim (option_sum state (MapGet state p a)); intro y.
